title: Ticket #4441: condor_install can be used for an initial configuration for testing
description:
We want any personal condor created for testing to use valid ports for the collector. "condor_install" which is really "condor_configure" in git would setup condor_collector == condor_host with no dynamic port request. So I modified it to use MetaKNobs for the local config file and they get dropped first in the file. This is only for the option --make-personal-condor. For this option, "use role : personal" comes out first. We still allow condor_host to get the machine name(full) and we delete the daemon list which would have hidden the one set up by the role:personal.

So this means if you have a man folder in your release_dir you can go there and enter "./condor_install --make-personal-condor", set your path to those bins and CONDOR_CONFIG to release_dir/etc/condor_config, start condor_master and be ready to test.
